description:
Socket an Artifact's [slot_trait] Trait Slot with this item to gain this trait:\n\nMaster of Spelljugglers:
If all the creatures in your party are {RACE_Spelljuggler}s, their single-target spells now target all the target's allies if the spell belongs to a different class than the last one they cast.
name: Sigil of the Spelljuggler
